text: The 2003 All Thailand Golf Tour is the fifth season of the All Thailand Golf Tour, the main professional golf tour in Thailand since it was established in 1999. ==Tournament results== The table below shows the 2003 schedule. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%" !Date !! Tournament !! Location !! Prize money men (฿) !! Men's winner |- | 13 Apr || Singha Pattaya Open || Burapha Golf Club || align=right|1,000,000 || Thaworn Wiratchant |- | 22 Jun || TPC Championships || The Vintage Club || align=right|1,000,000 || Jim Johnson |- | 26 Jul || Singha Classic || Springfield Royal Country Club || align=right|1,000,000 || Boonchu Ruangkit |- | 30 Jul || Cotto Open || Burapha Golf Club || align=right|1,000,000 || Simon Yates |} ==References== Category:All Thailand Golf Tour All Thailand Golf Tour
title: 2003 All Thailand Golf Tour
